snippet.title: Dying Light 2 Stay Human - Decide the Fate of the City - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Villedor was one of the first few places where the infection started. 
Walls surrounding the city were supposed to lock the danger inside, now, they protect from what’s out there.

Pre-order Dying Light 2 Stay Human now: https://www.microsoft.com/p/dying-light-2/9nqzkq65b8b3
